ovdesc.p: This screen is used to store all possible languages to be used in the payments hub.A client may have a language preference for receiving alerts; a user within a company (within a country) may want the information in a certain language; statement lines and charge description may be posted in a certain language.
A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or delete a record in store table, PPT.LANGUAGE.
